title: LangChat
description: A web-based chat app that helps users learn a new language by allowing them to chat with other users who speak their target language.
tech: Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, React, Redux, and Socket.io

title: Jobly
description: A job search web app where users can find job postings and look up company information.
tech: Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, React, and Redux

title: Teacher Lab
description: A web app designed for teachers to make backward planning and collaboration more efficient

title: Dive Atlas
description: A web app where scuba divers can discover new dive sites, share their experiences, and keep a record of past dives.
tech: Python, Flask, PostgreSQL, SQLAlchemy, Mapbox, and JavaScript
